description: Core Grove concepts for highlight extraction

concepts.definition: Ownership of AI compute and model weights distributed across personal devices rather than centralized data centers
Local 7B models for routine cognition, cloud APIs for pivotal moments requiring frontier capability
Agents earn credits by solving problems, spend credits on cloud compute access
Small portion of efficiency gains from adopted innovations flows back as credits to originators
Frontier AI capabilities migrate to consumer hardware on predictable timelines
AI capability doubling every 7 months with 21-month lag to consumer hardware
3-12 agents on a personal computer developing specializations and relationships
Infrastructure that makes guided exploration productive regardless of individual capability
Shared repository of innovations across the Grove network
Freedom from Big Tech gatekeepers in access to AI capability
Structural framework supporting DEX stack standards
Human who shapes agent environment without controlling every outcome
Running AI models on personal hardware for privacy and cost efficiency
Decision points requiring frontier capability accessed via cloud
Ongoing logs of agent experiences, thoughts, and relationships
